short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It is an integrated browser extension that offers the inbound and outbound call services to Pipedrive CRM users.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify business communications and customer relationships management with the Acefone for Pipedrive extension. 

Get a birdâ€™s-eye view of everything that goes on in your organisation with comprehensive analytical reports and meaningful insights such as customer patterns and trends. 

Not just that, arm your agents with smart tools that enhance their efficiency, such as the click-to-call button that eliminates manual dialling. The agents can even save images and add follow-up activities via the CRM. All without switching between tabs.
